title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Michael Malice | 5/20/22
description:
Glenn and Pat discuss Elon Musk and Tesla being removed from the S&P 500's ESG Index and possible reasons. Author Michael Malice discusses the Left's radical abortion views and Elon Musk. Glenn and Pat discuss the WHO's upcoming meeting, which will discuss giving the WHO complete control over the next pandemic. Glenn and Pat discuss what monkeypox is and its symptoms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
